so recently I've heard you can't spectate a scrim with two teams versing. I think the problem is they might think they are helping the other team bc someone might be tunneling underground. I think people without a team should be able to spectate scrimmages, to give a scrimmmage kind of a crowd. I don't know if staff can see msgs or what.

thanks,
